text: Uye (yeuka) apo Tenzi vako (Allah) vakaburitsa kubva muvana vaAdam, kubva kumisana yavo, vana vavo (kana kuti kubva kumusana waAdam vana vake), uye vakavaita kuti vave vanopa huchapupu pachavo (Allah vachiti): “Handisi ini here Tenzi venyu?” Vakati: “Hongu! Tinopa huchapupu”, pamwe nezuva rekumutswa (Qiyaamah) mungazoti: “Zvirokwazvo izvi takanga tisingazvizivi.”
